DOC.brief_summary: This study prospective , non-interventional , non-controlled , multi-center , observational cohort study . The medication prescribe within regular practice physician . Duration dosage treatment solely discretion attend physician . The primary objective study assess duration treatment Turkish renal cell carcinoma patient treat TKIs ( Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitors ) could tolerate prior cytokine treatment within first month treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Duration Treatment With Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitors Treatment Metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma
DOC.criteria: To diagnose metastatic renal cell carcinoma Previous cytokine therapy To sign informed consent form ( ICF ) Patients willing sign inform consent form withdraw consent
